decision_conditions: <p class="MsoNoSpacing">The applicant has failed to submit a satisfactory Flood Risk Assessment as the no information has been provided on the surface water flooding and impact the scheme would have to flooding and flood risk in the area, nor information on potential flood mitigation measures. Thus, the scheme has failed to demonstrate that the proposed development would not exacerbate the risk of flooding within the site or increase the risk and consequences of flooding elsewhere, contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), policies SI12 and SI13 of The London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1 U of Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and policies DM9 and DM10 of the Harrow Development Management Polices Local Plan (2013).</p>

<p>The&nbsp;proposed roof extension and rear dormer would have an
excessive scale and massing, resulting in an obtrusive, incongruous and dominating
addition to the bungalow, which would harm the character of the street scene
and unbalance the pair of semi-detached units. The proposal is therefore
contrary to the high-quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy
Framework (2023), Policies D3 of the London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of
the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development
Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning
Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).</p>

<p>The&nbsp;proposed front extension by reason of its excessive prominence,
awkward positioning and design, in conjunction with the poor positioning and
scale of the proposed fenestration would give rise to an obtrusive form of
development which would neither enhance nor preserve the visual character of
the host site and surrounding area, as well as unbalancing the pair of
semi-detached units, to the detriment of the surrounding character and street scene.
The proposal is therefore contrary to the high-quality design aspirations of
the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policies D3 of the London Plan
(2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 of the
Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted
Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).</p>
description: Single storey front to side extension; alterations and extension to roof and rear dormer; rooflight in front roof slope; re-location of main entrance to front; external alterations
